snippet: The new prime minister has the chance to revitalize the economy and shape how his country engages with the world.
abstract: Editorial holds that Narendra Modi's landslide victory in India's election for prime minister reflects changing country willing to extend governance to those outside established elite and opens up opportunity for Modi to re-shape economy and how India engages with world; says that question remains whether Modi will act as pro-business leader or Hindu nationalist with sectarian agenda.
lead_paragraph: The new prime minister has the chance to revitalize the economy and shape how his country engages with the world.

headline.main: With Narendra Modi, a Change in India
headline.print_headline: With Mr. Modi, a Change in India
